author: asianlego
title: Great For Making Sand
review:
If you are into Pirates, you would probably find these yellow plates good use to make sand bases as many olden Pirate themes use yellow plates as substitutes to baseplates when the set it too small. With many yellow plates here, I think you could make a decent sized island. Would be better if combined with blue plates (water) and green plates (occasionaly spot of grass)

-asianlego
